import React from 'react'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import Heading from './heading'; import './Styles/topposts.css'; class TopPosts extends React.Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { topPost:this.props.toppostsArr[0], OtherPost:this.props.toppostsArr.slice(1,4) } } render() { return (

Title of verticle gallery

Travel / August 21 2017

{this.state.topPost.title}

{this.state.topPost.type} / {this.state.topPost.date}

{this.state.topPost.id}

{this.state.OtherPost.map(post => <>
{post.title}

{post.type} / {post.date}

{post.id}

)}
) } } export default TopPosts;
